Event.name: intro
Event.text: Here your adventure begins. You will face lot of monsters etc.... Be ready. Choose the direction (left or right).

Event.name: door_w1
Event.description: Player choose to knock the door.
Event.text: You knock, twice. Nothing seems to happen. After a time someone open the door: 'What do you want human?'

Event.name: door_w2
Event.description: Player choose to force the lock.
Event.text: You failed to force the lock...

Event.name: door_w3
Event.description: Player choose to talk to the man.
Event.text: You explain that you need help. The man closes the door.

Event.name: door_w4
Event.description: Player beats the ghost and enters.
Event.text: You enter, find a long cooridor, walk almost an hour before falling into a trap... You're dead...

Event.name: east_entry
Event.text: You walk in an old and dark forest and get lost.
